data.title: 食品安全委員会 - 食の安全、を科学する
data.text:
The Food Safety Commission of Japan and the German Federal Institute for Risk Assessment have exchanged the Memorandum of Cooperation

The Food Safety Commission of Japan (FSCJ) and the German Federal Institute for Risk Assessment (BfR) signed and have exchanged the Memorandum of Cooperation [PDF].

The aim of the Memorandum of Cooperation is to enhance the scientific cooperation and dialogue between BfR and FSCJ in the fields of data collection and data sharing related to risk assessment for food safety.

BfR Homepage http://www.bfr.bund.de/de/start.html

[Left] Professor Dr. Dr. Andreas Hensel, President of BfR

[Right] Dr Hiroshi Satoh, Chairperson of FSCJ

(July 25, 2016)
